title: Pair of Ty Cobb postcards for sale
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: Pair of Ty Cobb postcards for sale
posts.post_content:
For sale are two rare and highly desirable Ty Cobb postcards. 

1913 M-101-3 and 1907 HM Taylor.

The 1907 HM Taylor is postally used and has period writing referencing Cobb on the front. Card is postmarked from October 1907; Cobb's initial World Series appearance.  SOLD

The M101-3 is graded PSA 1 and displays normal wear on the front, including rounded corners and some surface wrinkles - an area of scrapbook removal is present on the reverse. ON HOLD



Thanks

Chris
Bump for individual prices on the Cobbs.
